title: Catoctin Mountain Park: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Contact Public Affairs       All press contacts are initially made through the superintendent who serves as the public information officer for the park.   The park superintendent is Rick Slade.  His contact information is below.   Catoctin Mountain Park 6602 Foxville Road Thurmont, MD 21788-1598 Park Headquarters (301) 663-9330 CATO_superintendent@nps.gov
